title: I think my hextech is broken
body:
These have been the last hextech openings i have gotten
Omega squad teemo
2 regular skins
project zed
almost prom king ammumu
project yasuo
deep terror thresh
dragon trainer lulu
Apparently every second hextech i have to get a legendary :)

replies.body: Be happy while it lasts, I used to get only legendary few months ago, I even got legendary+gemstone once, but since then I have been getting 50% champ shards and 25% shitty skins and icons. It seems to balance itself out during the year :D
So you're the reason why I haven't has a skin in the last 7 chest. nothing but champion shards.
